evidence.location: Conclusion section, after analysis of constitutional issues
evidence.text: The Court shall enter an Order granting Plaintiffs’ motion, denying Defendants’ motion, and providing declaratory and injunctive relief permitting Plaintiffs to resume their duties as CPSC Commissioners.

extracted.value: Granted Plaintiffs' motion for summary judgment, denied Defendants' motion, and ordered declaratory and injunctive relief permitting Plaintiffs to resume duties as CPSC Commissioners
